2052.subject: ESSP
2052.descrlong: Introduction to the basic principles of physical science and application of these principles in modern society. Specific topics include: nature, properties, and reactions of matter; objects at rest and in motion, energy and power, fluids, heat, light, sound, electricity, and magnetism. Course will emphasize conceptual understanding and the scientific process in an active learning environment. For non-science majors. (Offered fall and spring semesters.)
